page.title: 06CLITHEROE'S PLANNING OFFICER
page.content: Mr. Nock the Planning Officer has seen many changes in Clitheroe. In the last seven years the major changes have been the building of Booth's Supermarket and the development of the Salthill Industrial Estate. Clitheroe requires some more facilities for children e.g. Youth Clubs or B.M.X. tracks. Mr Nock thinks these are needed but are difficult to open because people have to run them. A sports area is being built by the Council and the Round Table. One of the main changes in the near future is the removal of the Auction Mart to the Salthill Industrial Estate. Mr. Nock has no typical day. He has to read letters and answer them. He discusses things with other members of the Council. What he wants is to make a better place to live and work.
